nodes.text: This space station was located in the outlying Duro system during the early part of the Galactic Civil War. The young Tarrin Datch, whose family owned nearby Pellezara station, often used this outlying station as a stunt range for his daredevil piloting fancies. This station featured a well-equipped medicenter.

In 1 BBY, Datch helped a fugitive freighter affiliated with the Rebel Alliance, which was undergoing maintenance at Pellezara, escape Imperial pursuit by jumping into hyperspace and taking temporary refuge at this outlying station.
